SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.messenger.util

Class Msgxml

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.messenger.util.Msgxml
public class Msgxml extends Object
Utility class providing XML document manipulation and processing functionality for the messenger system. This class offers static methods for creating, parsing, and transforming XML documents and elements.
Since:
2003

  • Constructor Details

    • Msgxml

      public Msgxml()

  • Method Details

    • newDocument

      public static Document newDocument()
      Creates a new empty XML document using the default DocumentBuilderFactory. This method provides a simple way to create a new XML document for manipulation.
      Returns:
      Document a new empty XML document, or null if creation fails
      Since:
      2003

    • addNode

      public static Element addNode(Node parentNode, String name)
      Adds a new XML element with the specified name to a parent node. This is a convenience method that calls addNode(parentNode, name, null).
      Parameters:
      parentNode - Node the parent node to add the new element to
      name - String the name/tag of the new element to create
      Returns:
      Element the newly created and added element
      Since:
      2003

    • addNode

      public static Element addNode(Node parentNode, String name, String value)
      Adds a new XML element with the specified name and text content to a parent node. Creates the element using the appropriate document context and optionally adds text content if a value is provided.
      Parameters:
      parentNode - Node the parent node to add the new element to
      name - String the name/tag of the new element to create
      value - String the text content to add to the element, or null for empty element
      Returns:
      Element the newly created and added element
      Since:
      2003

    • toXML

      public static String toXML(Document xmlDoc)
      Converts an XML document to its string representation. Uses JAXP Transformer to serialize the document to XML text format.
      Parameters:
      xmlDoc - Document the XML document to convert to string
      Returns:
      String the XML document as a string, or empty string if transformation fails
      Since:
      2003

    • parseXML

      public static Document parseXML(String xmlInput)
      Parses an XML string and returns the corresponding Document object. Uses DocumentBuilderFactory to parse the XML string into a DOM document.
      Parameters:
      xmlInput - String containing XML text to parse
      Returns:
      Document the parsed XML document, or null if parsing fails
      Since:
      2003

    • getText

      public static String getText(Node node)
      Extracts all text content from an XML node and its child text nodes. Iterates through all child nodes and concatenates text from TEXT_NODE types.
      Parameters:
      node - Node the XML node to extract text content from
      Returns:
      String the concatenated text content of the node, or empty string if no text
      Since:
      2003
